com.camerontec.catalys.util.marketdata

Class DecimalPlacesConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.marketdata.DecimalPlacesConversion

  • public class DecimalPlacesConversion
extends Object
    Some utility methods for converting ints, longs to String's with decimal places.

    • Method Detail

      • intToBytes

        public static final byte[] intToBytes(int n,
                                      int decimalPlaces)
        Represent a number as a byte array, including a possible decimal point. If decimalPlaces is a positive value then the supplied integer is divided by 10^decimalPlaces before being converted to the byte array. If decimalPlaces is zero (or negative) then the integer is converted as is to the byte array.
        Parameters:
        n - Integer representation of the number.
        decimalPlaces - The number of decimal places.
        Returns:
        The byte array representation of this number with its decimal places.

      • intToString

        public static final String intToString(int n,
                                       int decimalPlaces)
        Represent a number as a string, including a possible decimal point. If decimalPlaces is positive then the supplied integer is divided by 10^decimalPlaces before being converted to a string. If decimalPlaces is zero (or negative) then the integer is converted as is to a string.
        Parameters:
        n - Integer representation of the number.
        decimalPlaces - The number of decimal places.
        Returns:
        The string representation of this number with its decimal places.

      • longToBytes

        public static final byte[] longToBytes(long n,
                                       int decimalPlaces)
        Represent a number as a byte array, including a possible decimal point. If decimalPlaces is positive then the supplied long is divided by 10^decimalPlaces before being converted to a byte array. If decimalPlaces is zero (or negative) then the long value is converted as is to a byte array.
        Parameters:
        n - The long representation of the number.
        decimalPlaces - The number of decimal places.
        Returns:
        Byte array representation of this number, including a possible decimal point.

      • longToString

        public static final String longToString(long n,
                                        int decimalPlaces)
        Represent a number as a string, including a possible decimal point. If decimalPlaces is positive then the supplied long is divided by 10^decimalPlaces before being converted to a string. If decimalPlaces is zero (or negative) then the long value is converted as is to a string.
        Parameters:
        n - The long representation of the number.
        decimalPlaces - The number of decimal places.
        Returns:
        String representation of this number, including a possible decimal point.

      • stringToInt

        public static final int stringToInt(String str,
                                    int decimalPlaces)
        Convert a string represented decimal number to an integer.
        Parameters:
        str - String representing the decimal number.
        decimalPlaces - The number of decimal places to multiply out.
        Returns:
        Number, scaled up by a factor of decimalPlaces to a int.

      • stringToLong

        public static final long stringToLong(String str,
                                      int decimalPlaces)
        Convert a string represented decimal number to a long.
        Parameters:
        str - String representing the decimal number.
        decimalPlaces - The number of decimal places to multiply out.
        Returns:
        Number, scaled up a factor of decimalPlaces to a long.
